units.title: Mount sections on 96-well superstructure
units.text: sections were placed on a 96-well format coverslip that was subsequently attached to a 96-well superstructure allowing immunohistological treatment, followed by imaging and antibody elution.
units.rationale: Describes how tissue sections are prepared for high‑throughput immunostaining.

units.title: Perform 4i multiplexed immunohistochemistry on FFPE sections
units.text: we performed multiplexed immunohistochemistry on 3-μm-thick formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) sections (1–4 sections per sample; Supplementary Table 1 and Fig. 1b).
units.rationale: Specifies the sample type and thickness for the iterative immunofluorescence protocol.

units.title: Acquire tiled high‑resolution images
units.text: Images were acquired at ×40 magnification with a high-numerical-aperture silicone oil objective, tiled across the tissue.
units.rationale: Details the imaging settings required for subsequent analysis.

units.title: Antibody elution and registration cycle
units.text: Elute antibodies - Register - Pixel cluster e MTUs 1: HCs f MTUs
units.rationale: Outlines the core steps of each 4i cycle: antibody removal, image registration, and pixel clustering.

units.title: Segment nuclei and organelle masks
units.rationale: Indicates the segmentation of nuclear and mitochondrial regions for downstream quantification.

units.title: Denoise structural image data
units.rationale: Specifies a preprocessing step to improve image quality before analysis.

units.title: Perform UMAP heterogeneity analysis
units.text: Heterogeneity analysis of nuclei with UMAP projection based on staining cycles.
units.rationale: Describes the dimensionality‑reduction method used to identify distinct nuclear phenotypes.

units.title: Assemble antibody panel
units.text: We established a panel of 63 antibodies covering major retinal cell types, subcellular compartments, morphological structures and signaling pathways split into three color channels.
units.rationale: Provides the composition of the multiplexed antibody set required for comprehensive profiling.

units.title: Compute spatial developmental dynamics
units.text: together we developed a computational approach for inferring spatial developmental dynamics from multiplexed protein maps of heterogeneous organoids.
units.rationale: Summarizes the analytical pipeline that translates protein maps into developmental trajectories.
